嚽字的基本解释

嚽
chuò
古同“啜”，吃。

嚽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuò］
［《廣韻》昌悦切，入薛，昌。］
［《廣韻》嘗芮切，去祭，禪。］
［《廣韻》陟衛切，去祭，知。］
［《廣韻》殊雪切，入薛，禪。］
亦作“嚽1”。亦作“涰1”。
(1)食；饮。
(2)羹。
(3)哭泣抽噎貌。
(4)古代突厥的行政区域名。
(5)见“啜哄”、“啜賺”。
(6)同“綴”。拖着。参见“啜狗尾”。
[②]［chuài］
见“啜2喇”。

嚽字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嚽； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页214第24
【正字通】啜歠?同。【荀子·富國篇】嚽菽飮水。【註】嚽與啜同。

嚽字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嚽字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Hum
chuò
Gu Tong "slurps" and eats.
Hum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chuò]
["Guang Yun" Chang Yue cuts into Xue, Chang. ]
["Guang Yun" taste Rui Qi, go to worship, Zen. ]
["Guang Yun" Zhi Wei cut, go to sacrifice, know. ]
["Guangyun" cut snow, enter Xue, Zen. ]
Also known as "嚽1". Also known as "Chuan 1".
(1) Food; Drink.
(2) Soup.
(3) Crying and sobbing appearance.
(4) The name of the administrative area of ancient Turks.
(5) See "slurp" and "slurp".
(6) Same as "fix". Dragging. See "Shooting a Dog's Tail".
[②]［chuài］
See "Sip 2 La".
Hum
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嚽; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 214-24
[Zhengzitong] Sip 歠? Same. 【Xunzi·FuGuo Chapter】Sizzling water. [Note] Ho and sip are the same.
